name: CreateDataColorTheme
description:
Create a new data color theme for the environment.

This tool allows you to create a new data color theme within a specified environment for a project. Use this when you need to define or update visual styles for data representation in an environment.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: Project ID to access the desired project. Obtain it through a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: data_color_theme_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details about the theme: id (int), name (str), colors (str), is_global (str), created_at (str), created_by (json).

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Datadog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
